name: Outer Space and its things
description:
Overview

All scientists of the world agree in one thing. The planet will explode in 15 minutes.

I'ts a hard decision but we need to escape from earth, your beloved home. Build a rocket and escape humanity anihilation.

Tutorial 
There are 5 zones. 
Town, Wood, Coal, Metal and Rocket.
You can move your population from one zone to another. 
Gather them with left click, and drop them with right click.
Update your zones with the buttons on screen.
Try to speed up your rocket development, so you can escape a certain humanity anihilation.

Advices

- Workers on the rocket doesn't have a big impact , it's better to upgrade it.

- Focus on wood, and try to mantain town upgrades at first.

- When you have 5 minutes left you should already have some rocket upgrades.
